name: Front Page
description:
December 2077, one week before the election.

The world changed but conflicts are still the same. You're in charge of choosing articles every day to prepare the newspaper's front page.  Medias have power but your choices will have consequences. 

Project realized for the Secret Santa Jam 2021.

**************** Credits ****************

Story and art: Emilie GARCIA TIMEUS
Development: Edouard MOINARD
